content.description: Start slightly around the corner to the left of girl power on the edge of the top side of the boulder (helps to heel hook on the corner). Traverse left around the next corner until you're holding 2 good flat ledges next to each other (slightly up and to the left of those will be a nice jug). At this point you can top out using the several good holds on that side of the boulder.
content.location: Left around the corner from girl power (with a great view)

content.description: Short Lowball around and to the left of campus girlz. Start matched on a huge obvious sloper rail. Figure out your feet for the start and pull off the ground making a big move up and left to a little sloper crimp. Adjust your left foot to something that will hold you into the wall (a heel hook works well) then come into a pretty good pocket crimp thing. Get your feet up and lunge for the divot on the lip.
content.protection: 1 pad. Or none it helps to not have any.
content.location: When you walk down from the trailside boulder youâ€™ll immediately see it. Obvious chalked up rail start

content.description: sit start on two crimps midway up wall, the a few powerful moves strait up to the lip
content.location: opposite side of the boulder from campus girlz

content.description: Start on two sidepulls and go up making a move to a flat hold then go up to a juggy left hold throw up to a sloper get a heel come into a crimp go high and left to a Gaston bump your right foot up a bit then bump your hand to a slopey jug.
